review_blob: One of the most popular cheap beers for those who grew up near Chicago.  Not the best beer, but there are definitely worse out there. Discovered this stuff when going on a beer run for a co-worker while attending college and working job near Chicago.  Its a light beer, and wont make you feel bloated unless you drink tons of the stuff
One of my favorites.  Has a mixture of apple mixed with citrus flavors, and crisp carbonation.
Actually not too bad for a malt liquor.  Has a slightly sweet/fruity flavor and good carbonation.   That being said, its not horrible but definitely not on the same page as a good microbrew.

A favorite of  broke college students on a budget and rednecks.  Gets you drunk for cheap, and isnt as nasty or potent as low end fortified wine like Thunderbird or Wild Irish Rose.  Comparison to Thunderbird and Wild Irish Rose is the only reason it didnt get across the board 1s.
